overview: The Cobraboyz are back at the Beach and this time these Beach Boys show you the most action packed fun we have ever filmed! Join these hot, smooth, American collegeboyz as they enjoy Spring Break by frolicking at the beach or pool side. There is a steamy outdoor solo scene, a 5 boy group jackoff, a very hot oral scene and four hot action scenes including a 3way bondage romp that you don't want to miss! As you know, Cobraboyz do it real and you'll get to hear all the boyz grunts and groans!
title: Bareback Beach Boyz
